sentences.en: A bistable storage device which stores binary data as states of flip - flop elements.
sentences.cn: 一种以触发器的状态存储二进制数据的双稳态存储器.

sentences.en: Anna flipped the switch that opened the front gate.
sentences.cn: 安娜按了打开前门的开关。

sentences.en: Flip the camera to vertical, recompose . Shoot again. Same sequence, methodical.
sentences.cn: 把相机竖起来,重新构图, 再拍,同样的场景, 依次拍摄.

sentences.en: He has been criticized for flip-flopping on several key issues.
sentences.cn: 他因为在几个关键问题上临场变卦而备受批评。

sentences.en: He seemed so sure of his decision, how could he flip-flop so dramatically now?
sentences.cn: 他当时好像对自己的决定非常肯定，现在怎么会突然有如此巨大的转变呢？

sentences.en: I was fed up with his flip comments.
sentences.cn: 我听够了他那些轻率的评论。

sentences.en: I wondered if I would flip out.
sentences.cn: 我不知道是否会失去自制力.
她是个不懂礼貌的小姑娘.

sentences.en: The door flip - floped in high wind.
The IRS would flip if I did so.
sentences.cn: 如果我这样做,那些国内税收局的人会气疯的.

sentences.en: The President's flip-flops on taxes made him appear indecisive.
sentences.cn: 总统在税收问题上的一再反复使他显得优柔寡断。

sentences.en: The tone of the book is sometimes too flip.
sentences.cn: 这本书的笔调有些时候太不严肃了。

sentences.en: The trade deficit is the flip side of a rapidly expanding economy.
sentences.cn: 贸易赤字是经济快速发展带来的负面产物。

sentences.en: There’s quite an art to flipping pancakes.
We flipped a coin to see who would go first.
sentences.cn: 我们抛硬币决定谁先去。

sentences.en: With a careless flip of his wrists, he sent the ball quickly on its way.
sentences.cn: 他手腕轻轻一抖，球就飞出去了。

sentences.en: Yaming flip - flopped down the stairs in her felt boots.
sentences.cn: 王亚明的毡靴在楼梯上扑扑地拍着.

words.tran_cn: 轻率的；嘴碎的；没礼貌的
鳍状肢；鳍；烤饼；胖听罐头

phrases.tran_cn: 菲利普·桑德斯（篮球教练）
[引申]另一方面；唱片的反面；相对立的人

trans.tran_cn: 〈口〉无理的， 轻率的， 轻浮的
浏览，空翻，（射击时枪管的）跳跃，轻抛
trans.tran_en: an action in which you make a flat object such as a coin go upwards and turn over in the air
to make a flat object such as a coin go upwards and turn over in the air

trans.tran_cn: 轻弹，轻击，按（开关），快速翻转，急挥
trans.tran_en: to move something with a quick sudden movement so that it is in a different position
